summary: Tired of those horrible little blue rocks with your lighting mods?
descriptionHtml:
I was tired of waiting for the mod teams around the nexus to fix this so I committed my afternoon to it; now those little rocks are gone! They are ugly in the vanilla version but stay the same as everything is made better by HD packs.  They aren't affected by some lighting mods and look completely out of place.  Not only are they ugly but you find them floating in some areas - totally immersion breaking! I tried numerous ways to make them work correctly but nothing worked out so I just decided to kill them off.
All you need to do is place this after the load order for any mods that alter lighting and/or landscape and you will never see those things again.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede
